question.xref: DES s6, HC p110, KYTS p79
question.text: What does ‘25’ mean on this motorway sign?

explanation.text: Before you set out on your journey use a road map to plan your route. When you see advance warning of your junction, make sure you get into the correct lane in plenty of time. Last-minute harsh braking and cutting across lanes at speed is extremely hazardous.

answer.text: The distance to the nearest town
The route number of the road
The number of the next junction
The speed limit on the slip road
